Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO ENVIRONMENTAL CONSERVATION

Title: Prohibits octopus farming
Summary: Provides that no person shall engage in the aquaculture of any species of octopus in the state for the purpose of human consumption.
LawCode: Add ยง13-0316-a, amd ยง71-0925, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to octopus farming
